kpi.name: MGW_995a

kpi_info.title: Sent octets on the M3UA association
kpi_info.use: The number of octets sent on the M3UA association. This counter calculates the number of bytes sent in M3UA messages. It consists of all the M3UA messages including M3UA header and M3UA payload.

kpi.kpi_alias: Sent octets on the M3UA association
